name: Ware(Dream)House
description:
Story:

The Warehouse calls you from your dreams but you don't know why, all you know is that you obliged and that there is something here you must take possession of. Do you dare step into the Ware(Dream)house?

Controls:

A moves Left

D moves Right

W moves Forwards

S moves Backwards

E interacts with objects

F turns on and off the flashlight when obtained

Shift to run

Credits:

All textures and sounds are used under CC-BY license, all textures and sounds belong to their respective license owners.
